subject: Reservation confirmed - John Smith arrives Jan 16
body:
LAKESIDE CABIN: SCENIC QUIET COVE

[https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/12345?c=.ab12.abcd=&abid=12345]

4:00 PM       11:00 AM

GUESTS

4 adults

MORE DETAILS ABOUT WHO’S COMING

Guests will now let you know if they’re bringing children
and infants. Let them know upfront if your listing is
suitable for children by updating your House Rules.
[https://www.airbnb.com/hosting/listings/1030377314130328796/details/safety-info]

CONFIRMATION CODE
HMXXX24X8Y

GUEST PAID

The money you earn hosting will be sent to you 24 hours
after your guest arrives. You can check your upcoming
payments in your Transaction History
[https://www.airbnb.com/users/transaction_history].

Your guest paid $52.67 in Occupancy Taxes. Airbnb remits
these taxes on your behalf.

CANCELLATIONS
